column2: 1. At the site <http://www.nm-msp.org/>, click on 'Find a Course'.
2. You'll be presented with a chance to enter a ZIP and mileage radius: enter 87110 and leave the default radius at '50'.
1. Open LibreOffice from the LibreOffice.app icon.
2a. Without clicking on anything or defocusing the window, press this to open a file.
2b. choose File -> Open from the menu.\n
3. This takes you to a page of Albuquerque classes. On the left hand side of each class listing is a tiny magnifying glass icon.
3. A dialog saying LibreOffice 5.0 - Fatal Error" and "Given module is not a frame nor a window, controller or model." opens."
When you close the dialog, LO closes.
4. If I click on this in Firefox, I am looped back to the same page.
